sections.text: In sections 43-4613 to 43-4623, close and substantial relationship means a relationship in which a significant bond exists between a child and a nonparent.SourceLaws 2015, LB219, ยง 13.

43-4613.Close and substantial relationship, defined.

In sections 43-4613 to 43-4623, close and substantial relationship means a relationship in which a significant bond exists between a child and a nonparent.

SourceLaws 2015, LB219, ยง 13.
